title: New: Wonder Wonder – Shark
body:
Mysterious London duo **Wonder Wonder** impressed on their debut track, clocking up well over 150k plays in little over a month, not to mention featuring on the most desirable blogs around.

Their follow-up and continuation of their promise to release one song a month for the next year, _Shark_, is another densely layered pop number, centred around exquisite production and a beautiful lead vocal line. Check it out below.
